mapper.sql:
FROM matnamMember a LEFT JOIN matnamMemberPhone b on b.mnMmSeq = a.mnMmSeq WHERE 1=1
AND mnMmDelNy = 0 AND mnMmDelNy = 1
AND mnMmGenderCd = 0 AND mnMmGenderCd = 1 AND mnMmGenderCd = 2
AND mnMmRankCd = 0 AND mnMmRankCd = 1 AND mnMmRankCd = 2
AND mnMmId LIKE concat('%',#{shValueId},'%')
AND mnMmName LIKE concat('%',#{shValueName},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.mnMmSeq , a.mnMmId , a.mnMmGenderCd , a.mnMmName , b.mnmpNumber , a.mnMmRankCd
LIMIT #{startRnumForMysql},#{rowNumToShow}
SELECT mnMmSeq , mnMmName , mnMmId , mnevDelNy FROM matnamMember WHERE 1=1 AND mnMmDelNy = 0; AND mnMmSeq = #{mnMmSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM matnamMember WHERE 1=1 AND mnMmSeq = #{mnMmSeq}
